name: Volumbra
printed_effect:
When you discard a Lunar Phase during your
Main Phase you can Special Ascend your Voldusk
to this Volumbra from your hand. When you cast
Lunar Phase-Full Moon you can Special Ascend
this Volumbra to Volclipse from your deck.
